B316, Bldg No.1,No.329Yushan W.road,MOCA Creative Industry Park, Panyu Guangzhou,China 511400 86-15018748580 86-20-39292071 86-20-39292498 admin@cnineo.com http://www.cnineo.com
This supplier has been audited by the b2b tradett.com >Add to Company Favorites Products Buffet Restaurant Equipment Total 8 Product(s) We are professional buffet restaurant equipment factory and supplier in China.We can produce buffet restaurant equipment according to your requirements.More types of buffet restaurant equipment wanted,please contact us right now! View:
Buffet Restaurant Cake Showcase AB Double front door opening design is more convenient for customer to choose the cake. Reinforced glasses application can improve the load carrying capacity.Suitable for commercial use such as bakery,supermarket and buffet.
Counter Top Gas Griddle TGH-21.R This kind of gas griddle is made of 304 stainless steel and it is widely used in commercial kitchen such as restaurant and hotel.
American Style 3 Pan Bain Marie DM-55 Bain marie is a type of pot used to heat things to a controlled temperature. It is useful in applications in which overheating must be prevented to yield desirable results.The bain marie is used mainly in commercial kitchen such as buffet resturant and hotel.There are 2 room where can put some bowls and plates,cups and so on.
Stainless Steel Gas Griddle GH-718 Gas Grinddle is widely used in commercial hotel and restaurant. Whole boday made of stainless steel and the griddle surface is quite refined. And the ignition of this Gas Griddle is electronic.
Electric 4 Hot-plate Cooker Oven ZH-TT-4A Electric Hot-plate Cooker is widely used in commercial kitchen such as hotel and restaurant. We are the professional supplier which can provide you many kind of suitable equipment for you.
Electric Fryer EF-12L This kind of Electric Fryer has steady performance which is made of 304 stainless steel. As a kitchen equipment , it is widely used in the field of commercial business.
4 Layers Chocolate Fountain ANT-8060 Chocolate Fountain Model (ANT-8060) Chocolate can be micro-heating and chocolate fountain is a new product for the snack food, easy to use. A unique new way to enjoy chocolate.
5 Layers Chocolate Fountain ANT-8086 Chocolate Fountain Model: ANT-8086 Chocolate fountain can make your celebration into a special and memorable moment! A unique new way to enjoy chocolate. Chocolate can be micro-heating and chocolate fountain is a new product for the snack food, easy to use.
